title: Gift me royal shaco :D?
body: i have 208 rp but it cost 260 D:

replies.body: This is why you don't spend the 400 you start out with.
This is your second post in less days asking for this skin. Want to add me in game and have a game while I use it?

Message me in-game and we might be able to sort out a loan of some kind :D

IGN: BigLebowski
